PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-02742018-03-12,  ,  ,  ,  CH
ActMuseums Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of WILLIAM ROBERT YOUNG of Ottawa, Ontario, to be a trustee of the Board of Trustees of the Canadian Museum of History, to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years, effective June 1, 2018, in the place of Christopher McCreery, whose term has expired.
AttachmentsAttachment
